raw_body: EKANAYAKE – SITA ROSALIN (NEE SAMARAKOON) – 83 yrs – Beloved wife of late M. P. B. Ekanayake,​ loving Mother of Nilanthi,​ L.V. and Priyantha,​ Mother-in-Law of Ranjith Dayananda,​ Nilmini and Delysia,​ loving Grandmother of Venerable Watagoda Maggavihari Thero,​ Gavithra (Australia),​ Abhisheka,​ Tashiya,​ Kiara,​ Deemantha,​ Sajani,​ Ashini and Tirusha,​ loving Great-Grandmother to Navya,​ Neha and Maya,​ passed away peacefully on 01 August 2023. Remains lie at A. F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour,​ Borella from 4.00 p.m. Wednesday (02nd August). Cortege leaves on Thursday 03rd August 2023 at 04.00 p.m. for Burial at 04.30 p.m. at General Cemetery – Catholic Section,​ Borella.047611
